title: Bug 31627: DBCS Perspective Change Results in Core Dump After Adding DBCS Project to Workspace
description:
Language: Japanese
Build driver: eclipseSDKI20030211linuxgtk
OS: RedHat8 (Japanese: locale jaJP.eucJP), gtk 2.2
JDK Ver. : IBM JDK1.3.1 + SR3

Summary: DBCS: Perspective change caused core dump after adding DBCS project to the workspace.

Description:
After following the steps mentioned below, the workbench crashes unexpectedly resulting in a core dump.
OB: Clicking the 'Resource Perspective' icon in the shortcut bar causes a workbench core dump after step 12.
EB: It should successfully change the perspective without resulting in a workbench core dump. Please refer to the attachment (cvsdefect.zip) for more details.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the relevant software.
2. Add a DBCS project to the workspace.
3. Click the 'Resource Perspective' icon in the shortcut bar.
4. Observe the workbench for any unexpected behavior or a core dump.
